title: Valentine’s Day 4-page themed website with photo galleries

requirements.summary: Create 4 distinct pages/routes with a shared romantic Valentine’s theme (palette, typography, layout) applied consistently across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Site has 4 distinct pages/routes and a shared layout (header/nav and consistent styling).
Valentine’s theme uses a coherent palette (e.g., reds/pinks/cream) and consistent typography and spacing across pages.

file_operations.description: Create the app’s top-level router and shared layout wrapper that renders 4 distinct routes/pages with consistent themed structure (header/nav + main content).

Implement a shared layout (header/nav + content container) that applies consistent spacing and typography; optionally use shadcn-ui components (e.g., navigation buttons/links styling) to keep UI consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add global Valentine’s theme styling (romantic palette, typography, spacing) and apply the repeating heart pattern background image site-wide using frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-bg.dim_1920x1080.png.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens (colors/typography/shadows) to support the Valentine’s palette and consistent styling across all pages.

requirements.summary: Implement Page 1 (landing) with the exact user-provided long message and display the 1st and 4th uploaded images.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 1 shows the message text exactly as provided (including spelling/casing/punctuation) without truncation.
Page 1 displays IMG_20260123_022920_162.jpg and IMG_20260123_022853_008.jpg prominently (responsive on mobile and desktop).

file_operations.description: Create Page 1 view containing the message text exactly as provided and render the two specified images (IMG_20260123_022920_162.jpg and IMG_20260123_022853_008.jpg) responsively from frontend static assets.
Wire Page 1 route into the app router and ensure it is reachable via navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Page 2 with the exact heading and a responsive gallery containing the specified four images.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 2 displays the exact heading text provided.
Page 2 shows a responsive gallery/grid containing exactly: IMG_20260110_001106_333.jpg, IMG_20260123_022956_194.jpg, IMG_20260123_022822_917.jpg, IMG_20260123_023006_342.jpg.

file_operations.description: Create Page 2 view with the heading text exactly: "some of the countless memories that we had in the last 8 months" and render a responsive gallery/grid containing exactly the four specified images from frontend static assets.

Create a reusable responsive photo gallery/grid component (used by Page 2 and Page 4); optionally use shadcn-ui components for consistent cards/dialogs if desired. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire Page 2 route into the app router and ensure it is reachable via navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Page 3 with the exact text and a generated flower image as the main visual.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 displays the exact sentence provided (including spacing and 'Mee').
Page 3 displays the generated flower image asset as the main visual (responsive).

file_operations.description: Create Page 3 view that displays the exact text " I will always have all the gift that u gave Mee in my heart " and uses frontend/public/assets/generated/flowers.dim_1200x800.png as the main responsive image.
Wire Page 3 route into the app router and ensure it is reachable via navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Page 4 as a responsive gallery containing the remaining uploaded photos (not used on Pages 1 and 2).
acceptanceCriteria: Page 4 shows a responsive gallery/grid containing exactly: IMG_20260123_022914_736.jpg, IMG_20260123_022814_325.jpg, IMG_20260123_022756_879.jpg, IMG_20260118_135409_239.jpg, IMG_20260123_022932_300.jpg.

file_operations.description: Create Page 4 view rendering a responsive gallery/grid containing exactly the five specified remaining images from frontend static assets (and no others).
Wire Page 4 route into the app router and ensure it is reachable via navigation.

requirements.summary: Add simple sequential navigation between all 4 pages with a clear current-page indicator.
acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate to all 4 pages via visible UI controls without manually editing the URL.
Navigation highlights the current page or otherwise indicates where the user is in the sequence.

file_operations.description: Implement a top navigation component with links to all 4 pages and a current-page indicator; optionally use shadcn-ui Button/Navigation styling components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement Next/Previous navigation controls for sequential viewing across the 4 pages (mobile-friendly); optionally use shadcn-ui Button components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire SiteNav and SequentialPager into the shared layout so every page has consistent navigation and current location feedback.
Ensure router state is available to navigation components so the current page can be highlighted and next/previous can be computed safely.

acceptanceCriteria: All 11 uploaded images are included as frontend static assets and load correctly in the browser.
No backend calls are required to fetch or render the images.
